summary.span: 命名空間會提供類別，可讓您存取 ASP.NET 表單驗證、角色和設定檔應用程式服務做為 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that enable you to access ASP.NET forms authentication, roles, and profiles application services as Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和類別包含的方法，可讓您登入檢查哪些角色目前使用者所屬的使用者，和擷取使用者已透過 WCF 服務的設定檔屬性。The , , and classes contain methods that let you log on users, check which roles the current user belongs to, and retrieve profile properties for the user through WCF services. 命名空間也包含下列類別：The namespace also includes the following classes: - 用來在自訂驗證 cookie 從類別。, which is used to customize the authentication cookie from the class. - 用來在執行階段選取的成員資格提供者。, which is used to select the membership provider at run time. - 用來在執行階段選取的角色提供者。, which is used to select the role provider at run time. - 用來建立自訂驗證的使用者設定檔屬性。, which is used to create custom validation for user profile properties.
